interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bath Pillow, Kapmore Non Slip Bathtub Pillow Home Spa Bath Pillow Stopper-Comfort Neck Rest Back Support Bathtub (White Bath Pillow)
Review Date: 2018/11/30
Store: Kapmore
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Kapmore', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '14.57 x 11.42 x 1.97 inches', 'Item Weight': '150 Grams', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '14.57 x 11.42 x 1.97 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '190657906135'}
Review Text: this pillow starts to discolor and grow a mildew sort of if kept in the bath i would have assumed the material was more absorbent or water repellent for its use.
Review Title: cant keep in bath
Rating: 3.0

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preferences:** The user has a strong affinity for cotton and vanilla scents, favoring fresh and sweet aromas that evoke comfort. She actively seeks out curated collections that prominently feature these fragrances, maintaining her interest in unique or hard-to-find items.

- **Product Interest:** She continues to favor multipack or set options that align with her favorite scent profiles, demonstrating a consistent commitment to discovering special items within these categories.

- **Shopping Behavior:** Her recent purchases reinforce her enthusiasm for curated fragrance collections, highlighting her dedication to exploring a variety of special fragrance sets.

- **Reviewing Habits:** The user typically gives high ratings focused on product quality, but her recent review practices reveal an increasingly critical perspective. In her latest interaction, she provided constructive feedback on a bath product, addressing issues related to durability and maintenance. Her review emphasized concerns about material performance, indicating a more discerning approach to product evaluations.

Overall, the user remains engaged with fragrance sets that evoke comfort while also demonstrating an evolving perspective on quality and functionality in her product assessments. This critical lens reflects her growing expectation for products, even those that fall outside her primary fragrance interests, showcasing a well-rounded approach to her shopping experience.
